entry.title: Home for the Holidays by Madison Vining Bundle of Four
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 4
Price: 106.40

Home for the Holidays smells exactly like that: coming home for the holidays. It’s the warmth of a friendly hug when you walk through the door, the nostalgia of family traditions, and the joy of time spent together. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Madison @madisonviningblog.

"I wanted it to smell like, that is, the feeling of coming home to a place that is your soft place to land, where you're accepted and loved without question. I think we nailed it.

Get each candle for only $26.60 each when you purchase a bundle of four! (Save $45.60!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (256 hours total). This fresh and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength and an aroma of orange peel and sweet citrus with refreshing notes of apple, berry, and eucalyptus, intertwined in a nostalgic, cozy blend of balsam, pine, cedar, and sandalwood.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural, paraffin free soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Sulfate free, phthalate free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Wooden Nativity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 35.00

Transform your holiday décor with our Wooden Nativity Scene, a timeless centerpiece that brings warmth and charm to any space. Crafted from natural mango wood, this beautifully designed piece features a soft, neutral palette that seamlessly blends with both modern and traditional styles. Elevate your home with this nativity scene, inviting love and joy into your festive celebrations.

DIMENSIONS: 10.5” L x 2.5” W x 6.75” H 

WEIGHT: 1.01 lb (0.46 kg) 

Shop for more Home Décor and Christmas Candles.

entry.title: Country Pine by Allie Boss Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Country Pine is a breath of fresh air. The crisp blend of fir, cedar, and blue spruce paired with orange zest and sweet berries are like a peaceful walk through the woods on a cool evening. With lavender and sandalwood, it’s a soothing invitation to take it slow, and enjoy the quiet moments of home in the countryside. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Allie @alliemboss!

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total). This fruity and fresh fragrance features a moderate strength and a refreshing blend of fir, cedar, and blue spruce with crisp, sugared notes of orange zest and fresh berries, highlighted by soothing lavender and sandalwood.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Fluffy Coffee is a warm, sweet blend of almond cream intertwined with delicious white chocolate, caramel, vanilla bean, and a splash of espresso, topped with extra fluffy whipped cream and rich cinnamon.

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

entry.title: Country Home by Allie Boss Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Country Home is the feeling of “home, sweet home.” The sweet scents of apple and pear highlighted by nostalgic cedar and pine are like driving along the back roads of the countryside, between orchards and woods that lead to a cozy happy place full of love, warmth, and a little bit of spice. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Allie @alliemboss!

“The sweet blend of pomegranate and orange with hints of clove and cinnamon sticks are the perfect pairing that are equally warm as they are inviting. You will love how this set fills a room and keeps you coming back for more!”

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total). This fruity and spiced fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly blends warm and bright notes to create a warm, cozy space you’ll love.


INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Country Home by Allie Boss 8 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 8 oz Candle

Country Home is the feeling of “home, sweet home.” The sweet scents of apple and pear highlighted by nostalgic cedar and pine are like driving along the back roads of the countryside, between orchards and woods that lead to a cozy happy place full of love, warmth, and a little bit of spice.

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 40 hours of burn time. This fruity and bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that showcases a vibrant medley of sweet red apple and succulent pear with warm, spiced notes of clove and cinnamon, highlighted by a nostalgic blend of cedar, sandalwood, and pine.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 6.9 oz (195.8 g)

DIMENSIONS: 3.5” x 3” x 3”
